Key Match Events: Andrew Benintendi’s one-out line single to left in the 10th inning off lefty Jose Quijada scored free runner Miguel Vargas.
The White Sox walked off the Angels 4-3 in the 10th inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Andrew Benintendi said, 'Guys aren’t going to pack it in.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox avoided becoming the outright worst team in major-league history for a second consecutive night.
